body.name: Nuyoah Monitor Wall Mount Tilt Swivel Full Motion for 10”-26” TV Screens, RV TV Mount Camper, Small TV Wall Mount for Computer Monitors with Max VESA 100x100mm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 55 mins
features: Full Motion for Ergonomic Viewing Experience - Our rv tv wall mount provides the perfect TV or monitor angle with minimal effort. You can customize your view angle with ±45° swiveling tv from left to right and choose the most comfortable position to upgrade your viewing experience. That tool-less tilt adjustment -20° to +20° help reduce glare, also small tv mount lets you tilt the TV up to make easier cable connections and maintain a clean look in your TV mounting space.

Universal Monitor Wall Mount - This camper tv mount is compatible with both TVs and computer monitors, fits well with SAMSUNG, SONY, LG, VIZIO, TCL, SCEPTRE, HISENSE, Echo Show 15 and most TV brands among 10” to 26” screens weighing up to 33 lbs with VESA 75x75mm or 100x100mm hole patterns, wall mounted sleek design offers a stylish look to suit any decor, ideal for classrooms, offices, homes, public areas, RV TV Mount Camper, and many more.

High-strength Steel for Heavy-duty Performance - Our small tv wall mount constructed with SPCC heavy-guage steel materials. Advanced welding from robotic arms and material thickness ensures your TV is safe. The wall tv mount is rated for 33lbs capacity, and is load tested to at least 2 times this limit, making it a sturdy tv mount you can trust in. The sleek black powder finish provides a modern reinforcing layer to increase its endurance, effeciently prevent from scratches.

Mount it Anywhere for Everyday Use - Made for a modern lifestyle, this mounting bracket has built-in features and quick release function that help you get the most out of your display. Displaying your screen in a convenient location on the wall, mount your monitor to eye level, no need bend your neck to watch the screen, but improve your posture for productive work. Of course that tv mounting on wall frees up much valuable desktop space and make your workstation spacious and clutter-free.

Pre-assembled & Easy Setup - Installation is very simple thanks to one piece wall plate design and single stud installation. We provide all of the necessary hardware and instructions for fast and easy assembly, so you can get your screen mounted in no time! This tv wall mount designed to the last and backed by reliable after-sale service, limited-lifetime replacement pledge and free technical support. Any questions please feel free to contact us at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Holding it up no issues. Install was little hard as nothing to really balance a level on but it’s pretty straight. Holds tv no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fast service good description accurate and just what I wanted Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s very small
reviews.reviewText: Product was intact just not the correct size.Misunderstanding on my behalf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply designed product!
reviews.reviewText: This product is poorly designed and very hard to mount to the wall. The tilt up and down bracket is extremely hard to tighten the nut with the provided wrench. Also the adjustment nut to adjust from left to right is extremely hard to get to after mounting my 22 inch monitor to the wall.I am mechanically inclined and it took 1-1/2 hours to mount to the wall with my wife helping me.My advise, do not waste your money to purchase this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty TV mount, able to hold up an old plasma!
reviews.reviewText: This comes in a nice little, heavy box. Heavy duty and was a bit stiff to use its motions and so far, after a bit of movement and a teeny bit of some oil, moves great now but still holds in whatever position you set it too. Got it mounted directly into some wooden studs and mounted my old Panasonic plasma TV. For those of that know, plasmas were/are VERY heavy and this thing is holding it up quite well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, but useable
reviews.reviewText: It should be titled "Tilt OR swivel". The mount only moves one way, so if you mount it one way, it tilts up and down. Turn it 180 and mount it, it moves side to side. No way does this thing "swivel". I'm mounting a bunch of video monitors to a wall. I don't need it to swivel, just need it to be cheap. These things work fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy made and articulates well
reviews.reviewText: I got this tv mount for my man cave and it's perfect. Very heavy made and will support tv's up to 55 inches. It's easy to assemble and mount and has nice articulation to make the tv viewable from any part of the room. It came with all of the screws and hardware needed to mount it. Good price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic monitor mount
reviews.reviewText: Really just a basic tv/monitor Mount. Not a lot of range of motion but it keeps my monitor off the table. Easy to install.
